short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: (V3) Actually refreshes Power BI dashboard every set interval (real)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Refreshes Power BI dashboard automatically. 
- This works on any dashboard. Just make sure you don't put it in Power BI's full-screen mode. F11 is okay.
- User is allowed to set an interval of x seconds to refresh the dataset, after which a draggable element will show up, showing the last refresh time and the next refresh time. 
- Can achieve refresh intervals that are <15 minutes. Useful if you are displaying a real-time dataset in Power BI.
- Does not automatically apply to dashboards. You have to click the extension icon to use it. 
- If you reload the page, you have to click the extension icon and set the interval again.
